mapper.insert: insert into activity_detail (activity_detail_id, activity_id, all, activity_type, activity_discount, supplier_ids, supplier_serieses, commodity_ids) values (#{activity_detail_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{all,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity_discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supplier_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{supplier_serieses,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{commodity_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update activity_detail set activity_id = #{activity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, all = #{all,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_type = #{activity_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_discount = #{activity_discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, supplier_ids = #{supplier_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, supplier_serieses = #{supplier_serieses,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, commodity_ids = #{commodity_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where activity_detail_id = #{activity_detail_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select activity_detail_id, activity_id, all, activity_type, activity_discount, supplier_ids, supplier_serieses, commodity_ids from activity_detail where activity_detail_id = #{activity_detail_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select activity_detail_id, activity_id, all, activity_type, activity_discount, supplier_ids, supplier_serieses, commodity_ids from activity_detail
